Harvest the Craven.name: Harvest the Craven
Harvest the Craven.flavor: You call terror down on your foes. They fear to remain alone.
Harvest the Craven.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is slowed, and it takes a -2 penalty to all defenses when it is not adjacent to another enemy.

Tenor of Wrath.name: Tenor of Wrath
Tenor of Wrath.flavor: The sky darkens and the ground trembles as you manifest your god’s terrifying presence.
Tenor of Wrath.effect: The burst creates a zone of fear that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. If willingly entering a square within the zone would bring an enemy closer to you, entering that square costs the enemy 1 extra square of movement.

Cascade of Fear.name: Cascade of Fear
Cascade of Fear.flavor: You raise your implement high and speak words of portent, assuring your foes of your god’s wrath and sending them sprawling in fear.
Cascade of Fear.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed (save ends). The target takes a penalty to saving throws against this effect equal to your Constitution modifier.
Cascade of Fear.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is knocked prone.
